name: Falsified
description:
You need to read the 2 txt files included before playing

A list of movement techniques in the game
Sliding - Hold crouch while sprinting

Sprint jump - Jump while sprinting to keep momentum

Slide jump - Jump while sliding to keep momentum

Bhop - Jump constantly to slightly keep momentum and preserve stamina

Sprint bhop- Jump constantly to keep momentum

Perfect bhop - Keep momentum with 0 stamina loss

Air movement cap remover - Hold forward during a perfect bhop
